content.raw:
I've started the work in [https://bitbucket.org/peci1/ign-common/branch/add-uri-resolvers](https://bitbucket.org/peci1/ign-common/branch/add-uri-resolvers) .

I've noticed there's the `SetFindFileURICallback` which could be an alternative to my suggested change, but I haven't found any usages of this function anywhere. Do you have more information about it?
content.html:

I've noticed there's the SetFindFileURICallback which could be an alternative to my suggested change, but I haven't found any usages of this function anywhere. Do you have more information about it?
